entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 03:54 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.0°C
Wind: N 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the Rockies. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
